description:
From its array of stunning features to its clever family-oriented floor plan, this gem is sure to please those looking for a home with personality. Perched on a desirable corner allotment, this beautifully presented abode offers comfort, convenience and character. Inside, you'll find ceiling fans in all bedrooms and living areas, promising comfort all year round.

There are four good-sized carpeted bedrooms, including the air-conditioned primary bedroom and second bedroom with a built-in robe. Servicing the home is one neatly presented bathroom that features a tub, a large step-in shower and a separate toilet, while in the next room, you will find the functional laundry area with direct outdoor access.

The formal lounge welcomes you at the front door, complete with carpet flooring and a feature fireplace. This connects to the free-flowing dining area dressed with character-filled stone flooring, which flows seamlessly to both the living and kitchen spaces. To the family chef's delight, the innovative kitchen boasts a beautiful splashback, ample wood cabinetry and great bench space.

Outside, you'll discover spacious covered outdoor entertaining areas presenting the joys of open-air entertaining while offering protection from external elements. There's also a detached fifth bedroom that can be used as a teenage retreat or rumpus room to suit your needs. Car parking is available on both Shannon Avenue and Coorila Avenue, plus there are rainwater tanks to help save on utilities.

This property is located near Immanuel College and St Leonards Primary School, perfect for families with school-aged children. Enquire now and take the step to make this house your forever home.

Key features

- Open plan living/dining area
- Large windows in living room
- Timber kitchen with stainless steel appliances
- Modern, light-filled kitchen
- 5 spacious bedrooms
- Central bathroom with easy accessibility
- Separate bath and shower
- Outdoor entertaining area
- Solar PV System
- Corner allotment with tidy front yard
- Fully fenced, secure front & rear yards
- Ideal location close to beach
- Close to local amenities

Auction: Saturday 28th of January 2023 at 10:00 am On-Site (unless sold prior).

Any offers submitted prior to the auction will still be under auction conditions. It is the purchaser's responsibility to seek their own legal advice and a Form 3 Cooling-Off Waiver to provide with their offer.

PLEASE NOTE: This property is being auctioned with no price in line with current real estate legislation. Should you be interested, we can provide you with a printout of recent local sales to help you in your value research.
